publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6667 Christine Grahame: Borders Rail Full Steam Aheadâ€”That the Parliament notes the commitment of the Scottish Government to the reinstatement of the Borders Railway with stops at Tweedbank, Galashiels, Stow, Gorebridge, Newtongrange, Eskbank and Shawfair and considers that the Liberal Democrat, Conservative, Labour, Green and Independent support in the Parliament for the Edinburgh tram project was wholly misguided, is costing the Scottish public purse dear and should never have proceeded.
S3M-6667 Borders Rail Full Steam Ahead (lodged on 28 June 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-6667 Borders Rail Full Steam Ahead (lodged on 28 June 2010) Bill Kidd*, Christina McKelvie*
